snippet: Israel will be required under international law to take responsibility for helping Palestinian civilians if there are any further large-scale displacements from the fighting in Gaza, a top U.N. envoy told the United Nations Security Council on Thu...

headline.print_headline: Israel May Be Required to Help Displaced Gaza Palestinians: U.N. Envoy
headline.main: Israel May Be Required to Help Displaced Gaza Palestinians: U.N. Envoy

lead_paragraph: Israel will be required under international law to take responsibility for helping Palestinian civilians if there are any further large-scale displacements from the fighting in Gaza, a top U.N. envoy told the United Nations Security Council on Thursday.
